name: Switch Runner (Scotty Rich)
description:
Overview

Switch Runner is a basic runner game, focused on fast-paced platforming and smashing enemies. The track is not endless, so try to last till the end. Only one level. Only one hit.

Controls ACTIONKEYBOARDSwitch Sides⬅ Left +  ➡ RightSpeed Up / Slow Down⬆ Up + ⬇ DownConfirmEnter Background

Created in late 2016, this was my first game made in Java. I did the art, level, BGM, and coding. Made it within two weeks as a final project for an introductory programming course.

The idea originated from just a game I played in my head while riding in the car as a child. Bouncing from left to right on the street, trying to avoid cars and pitfalls. It entertained my as a kid, so I figured it might entertain others as well.

At one point I had thoughts of continuing this project, but decide against it. I may reuse mechanical ideas in future projects however.

Running the Game
  1. Requires Java Runtime Environment 1.7.0_40 or later
  2. Download .ZIP package
  3. Unzip the folder within Windows' file explorer
